## User Workflow  

**Example structure (customise as needed):**
1. User logs in through a web or desktop interface  
2. User uploads data or connects a datasource  
3. System validates and pre-processes the data  
4. Automated workflows run analyses or transformations  
5. AI module generates insights or summaries  
6. User receives outputs (reports, dashboards, models)  
7. Feedback loop improves future predictions  

```mermaid
flowchart TD
    A[Login / Access] --> B[Upload Data<br/>(or connect datasource)]
    B --> C[Data Validation<br/>(format, completeness)]
    C --> D[Automated Processing<br/>(workflows, transformations)]
    D --> E[AI Analysis<br/>(summaries, extraction, insights)]
    E --> F[Output Generation<br/>(reports, dashboards, exports)]
    F --> G[Review & Feedback Loop<br/>(improves future accuracy)]
```
